hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Qatadah said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) leading the people in prayer, carrying Umamah bint Abi Al-'As on his shoulder. When he bowed he put her down and when he finished prostrating he picked her up again

chapter.ara-name: باب حَمْلِ الصَّبَايَا فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَوَضْعِهِنَّ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Carrying small children and putting them down while praying
